original_title: The Little Guide to Foreign Swear Words
overview: In early 2020, former student Jack gets a job working in an art gallery in Berlin only for the coronavirus pandemic to arrive and ruin his plans. Jack notices his old university flame is stuck in Tuscany and decides to quit his new job and travel through Europe during lockdown with his new mates to find her.
tagline: Border Control has never been so difficult
title: The Little Guide to Foreign Swear Words
